title: Science Collaborative Design Workshop for Fostering Creativity

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science concept comprehension and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing project-based learning linked to science curricula

learning_goals: Explain three or more strategies for demonstrating scientific creativity through collaborative problem-solving processes.
Visualize scientific phenomena using VR simulation tools and prototype creative solutions two or more times.
Improve design proposals through two or more stages by incorporating peer feedback during team-based project implementation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
